allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Pre-Payroll Approval Guard MVP

Complete end-to-end workflow implementation:
- CSV upload with validation
- Diff calculation between baseline and current payroll
- 12 deterministic judgement rules \(2 blockers, 7 material, 1 non-material, 2 defaults\)
- One-screen review UI with material changes and blockers
- Approval workflow with audit trail
- Multi-tenant architecture with RLS
- Mobile responsive design

Tech stack:
- Next.js 14 with Pages Router
- Supabase PostgreSQL
- Python processing tools
- Tailwind CSS v3

Documentation:
- Deterministic rules reference \(docs/DETERMINISTIC_RULES.md\)
- Judgements workflow guide \(docs/JUDGEMENTS.md\)
- Workflow SOPs \(workflows/\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(npx vercel env add NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL production --token="KYRiis10INkRse3qrGcM5HE1")
Bash(npx vercel env rm NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL production --token="KYRiis10INkRse3qrGcM5HE1" --yes)
Bash(npx vercel env add N8N_DIFF_WEBHOOK_URL production)
